Fastcgipp::Manager::Tasks

Fastcgipp::Manager< T >::Tasks Class Reference

Queue type for pending tasks. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class Fastcgipp::Manager< T >::Tasks

Queue type for pending tasks.

This is merely a derivation of a std::queue<Protocol::FullId> and a boost::mutex that gives data locking abilities to the STL container.
